TopicTitle: LY-10 Small Landing gear is not Wheels?

Articles.Content:
It is good that i find this on Minmus, befor going to Duna with same misson.

Edited August 12, 2015 by Moonk

Yes they are wheels. They can roll.

But they're not powered by a motor.
You can use the B9 Pack they have landing gears with motors

So looks like only powered wheels count? Only RoveMax?

- - - Updated - - -

I have found solution Alt+F12

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/104842-The-outpost-must-be-on-wheels
They are landing gear, not "wheels". By wheels they mean rover wheels.

Does the craft actually have to stand on rover wheels or can you stick a little one somewhere on the vessel and use the rotate/translate gizmos to clip it inside where you can't see it...? May be worth testing if you would rather keep the landing gear for aesthetic/performance reasons.
